name: The Last Conflict (itch)
description:
They will run you down, down 'til the dark ,
and they will run you down, down 'til you fall,
and they will run you down, down 'til you crawl,
Until you can't crawl no more, no more.

The dawn of the end is here, what terrifying monstrosities could be lurking in the shadows?

Explore over 100 unique maps

Survive the onslaught of the hordes

**IN HEAVY DEVELOPMENT**

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Hold Shift - Run
R - Reload
Q - Drop Item
G+MouseHover - Pickup Item
Tab - Inventory
E+MouseOver - Interact with doors and switches
F - Dual Wield(line weps next to each other)
0..9 Numkeys - Equip Weapon
RightClick - Toggle Drawn Stance
LeftClick - Attack while in Drawn Stance
Hold LeftClick over cades - Move around barricades
ALT + SCROLL - Take control of crew member
